title: Africa: CARE Report - "Breaking the Silence": Top Ten Humanitarian Crises That Didn't Make Headlines in 2023 - All in Africa
description: [Care] All ten forgotten crises are in Africa  300 million people will need humanitarian aid in 2024 - almost half of them in Africa

title: Africa: Africa's Crises Fall Out of Focus As Global Attention Drifts
description: [DW] Care International has listed the ten forgotten humanitarian crises of last year -- all of them in Africa. Climate change plays a huge role, the aid organization says, and more media attention is needed.
